TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationServicesHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory

summary.span: 提供 Factory 類別，以便在 Managed 裝載環境中建立驗證服務、角色服務和設定檔服務的執行個體。

span.span: Provides a factory class that creates instances of the authentication service, role service, and profile service in managed hosting environments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 factory 類別可用來建立的執行個體， ，和類別。This factory class provides a way to create instances of the , , and classes. 若要使用此 factory 類別，建立 WCF 服務 (.svc) 檔案，並指定中`ServiceHosting`屬性`@ ServiceHost`指示詞。To use this factory class, create a WCF Service (.svc) file and specify in the `ServiceHosting` attribute of the `@ ServiceHost` directive. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定中`@ ServiceHost`設定驗證服務的.svc 檔案的指示詞。The following example shows how to specify in the `@ ServiceHost` directive of a .svc file to configure the authentication service. ```csharp <%@ ServiceHost Language="C#" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ``` ```vb <%@ ServiceHost Language="VB" Service="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService" Factory="System.Web.ApplicationServices.ApplicationServicesHostFactory" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost (Type serviceType, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (serviceType As Type, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHost
protected: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHost ^ CreateServiceHost(Type ^ serviceType, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

param.name: serviceType
param.span: 要建立的服務主機類型。

span.span: The type of service host to create.
An array of base addresses for the service.

summary.span: 建立服務類別的執行個體，這個執行個體有指定的基底位址。

span.span: Creates an instance of the service class that has the specified base address or addresses.

returns.span: 服務型別的 執行個體，這個執行個體有指定的基底位址。

span.span: A instance for the type of service that has the specified base address or addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常這個方法就會呼叫自動[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]service 的一部分啟用，而且您不需要手動呼叫這個方法。Usually this method is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] as part of service activation, and you do not have to call the method manually.
